original_text: And the people of Benjamin gathered themselves together behind Abner and became one group and took their stand on the top of a hill.
korean_text: 베냐민 족속은 함께 모여 아브넬을 따라 한 무리를 이루고 작은 산 꼭대기에 섰더라

sentences.original_text: And the people of Benjamin gathered themselves together behind Abner
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 베냐민 사람들은 아브너의 뒤에 모였습니다.

sentences.original_text: and took their stand on the top of a hill.
